name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce infrastructure at scale.
I've been coding for 13+ years, with 434 repos and 1.8K+ stars. Started with PHP, moved through Node.js, now primarily Go and TypeScript.
On the side, I run aiocean.io — building AI tooling and MCP servers. Recent focus: making AI agents more useful through better context protocols.
I write at 12bit.vn (technical deep-dives in Vietnamese) and onepercent.plus (product thinking). Co-founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016.
My approach: ship fast, iterate based on feedback, focus on utility over complexity. I care about tools that solve real problems.
Most proud of: obsidian-open-gate (221⭐), jira-mcp (79⭐), and various MCP experiments that push the boundaries of AI-human collaboration.
now: Building AI-powered element annotation tools (vite-plugin & Claude plugin)
